title: Startup Founders Podcast – 500 Mexico City Special Edition
content: This week, I'm bringing you two interviews from Mexico City! Listen in to hear founders talk about running a startup in one of the most exciting cities in the world. Listen Now: Interview with May Alba, CEO and co-founder of rubberit Interview with Lulo Lopez, CEO and co-founder of Bandtastic Stream the episodes on Stitcher RSS Feed I'll have another interview from Mexico City next week, so stay tuned!
